name: Europa Universalis IV: Conquest of Paradise
name_original: Europa Universalis IV: Conquest of Paradise
description:
Europa Universalis IV: Conquest of Paradise is a strategy game developed by Paradox Development Studio. It came out on 14-01-2014. It was published by Paradox Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Europa Universalis IV: Conquest of Paradise on PC.
